basics.name: Zhen Zhu
basics.label: Final-year CS Ph.D Candidate
basics.summary: A final-year CS Ph.D. candidate at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (UIUC), specializing in building intelligent systems for continual perception, recognition, understanding, and prediction. Research interests include efficient continual learning, personal AI agents, image generation, and the emerging properties of large models. Strong background in fundamental vision tasks such as object detection and semantic segmentation.

work.name: Adobe Inc.
work.summary: Bridged LLMs and Diffusion models to create a dynamic system for automatic and continual data generation to improve discriminative task performance. A submission is in progress.

work.summary: Created a unified GAN framework for generating multiple image analyses with RGB images simultaneously and demonstrated the model's effectiveness in generating datasets for downstream tasks such as depth and normal estimation. Paper accepted to WACV 2024.
